description: This Python script demonstrates creating and managing a chat agent with persistent session memory stored in a SQLite database. It includes functions for creating an agent, printing chat history, and running an interactive chat loop.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents a chat agent capable of maintaining conversation state and interacting with an AI model.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interfacing with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Handles storage of session data in a SQLite database.

methods.name: create_agent
methods.description: Creates and initializes a chat agent, optionally resuming an existing session.

methods.name: print_messages
methods.description: Displays the current chat history for a session in a formatted panel.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main loop for interacting with the chat agent via command line prompts.
